title: Requirements Gathering and Analysis for CyberPhysicalSecuritySystem
description: Gather and analyze the project requirements for the CyberPhysicalSecuritySystem, including system architecture, functionalities, performance, security, interoperability, and user experience. This task involves breaking down the project into smaller tasks, defining the technical specifications, preparing a comprehensive document detailing the project requirements and user stories, and ensuring that the document is easily understandable by developers and non-technical stakeholders.

title: System Architecture Design
description: Design the overall architecture of the system, including how AI, IoT sensors, and blockchain will interact with each other and connect to the critical infrastructure.

title: Blockchain Implementation Design
description: Design the implementation of the blockchain component for data integrity, security, and consensus.

title: AI Model Development and Integration
description: Develop AI models for anomaly detection, intrusion prevention, and threat prediction. Integrate the models with the overall system.

title: IoT Sensor Integration Design
description: Design the integration of IoT sensors with the overall system and specify communication protocols.

title: Database Schema Design
description: Design the database schema for storing and managing data from IoT sensors, AI models, and blockchain.

title: Frontend Interface Development
description: Design and develop the user interface for system monitoring, configuration, and reporting.

title: DevOps and Infrastructure Setup
description: Set up the development, testing, and production environments and establish Continuous Integration/Continuous Deployment (CI/CD) pipelines.

title: Unit Testing
description: Write and execute unit tests for individual components of the system to ensure their correctness.

title: System Integration Testing
description: Test the overall functionality and performance of the system after integration.

title: Security Audit
description: Perform a security audit of the system to identify potential vulnerabilities and ensure compliance with relevant standards.

title: Documentation and Knowledge Base
description: Create technical documentation for the system architecture, components, setup, usage, maintenance, and troubleshooting.
